alert.note: Alert for Curry; Quay (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 9:31PM MDT until September 15 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Quay County in east central New Mexico... Central Curry County in east central New Mexico... * Until 1015 PM MDT. * At 931 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ragland, or 27 miles south of Tucumcari, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clovis, Ranchvale, Portair, Mcalister, Forrest, and Cannon Air Force Base. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 383 and 384. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
